description:
Never created a website before? Perfect.

This course was created for you.

Wordpress for beginners Our course is from the perspective of the learner is designed to be live on with your new WordPress site a step by step guide from begining. It includes not only the conceptual framework for a system based on the WordPress, but also includes the practical aspects of the construction of a modern website or blog. This is definitely a "Guide to worpress for beginners" and after this course, you can build your own professional website for your business or for yourself.

You will start with building blocks and WordPress installation and continue with the theory of content management. Here, you will learn the key building blocks of the WordPress admin panel. The next unit informs you teach about themes, plugins and widgets. Plugin management is the next unit that will teach, fresh galleries and videos on your website or blog. Also get about SEO plugins. You will also learn how to create your own topics.

This course should not get more than 2 hours, because it is very easy to understand and is for absolute beginners.
title: WordPress Essential Training in 2015
